label: 神宮寺
対訳語: Buddhist temple annex of a Shintō shrine
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddhist temple placed generally within the grounds of the Shintō shrine to which it was attached. Buddhist priests officiated in such shrines, serving both the Buddhas and the Deities (Kami ). [神道、神]
